prompt.content: How did Meta finance its "Hyperion" Louisiana data center?

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"States that Meta financed the Hyperion Louisiana data center through a joint venture SPV with funds managed by Blue Owl Capital."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"States that investment bank Morgan Stanley assisted Meta in arranging the financing."},{"criteria":"States that the structure supports about $27 billion of development costs.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"States that the SPV capital structure includes more than $27 billion of privately placed project bonds."},{"criteria":"States that SPV equity is approximately $2.5 billion.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"States that the equity ownership split is 80 percent for Blue Owl and 20 percent for Meta."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"States that PIMCO is the anchor investor in the bond financing."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"PIMCO is the anchor lender for the debt financing"},{"criteria":"States that Meta will operate and lease back the campus under long-term operating leases. ","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":" States that the project debt remains at the joint venture level."}]
